# Object properties

If your code does not work as expected, you might want to take a closer look at certain objects and inspect their properties.  
The following functions come in handy:

## The nature of an object

`str()`

`dplyr::glimpse()`

`class()`

`typeof()`

## Object attributes

`names()`

## Object size

`length()`

`dim()`

## Look at objects

`print()`

`View()`

`head()`

## Compare objects

`identical()`
